abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.description: Most scarce of Sigmar's forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Volleystorm
abilities.description: The Tempestors fire charged crossbow bolts into the foe, weakening their defences and leaving them open to a follow-up assault.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by attacks made with this unit's Volleystorm Crossbows to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, the target cannot use the 'All-out Defence' command in the following combat phase.
